mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.*, B.SCREEN_SEAT - NVL(R.TOTAL_RESERVED_VISITORS, 0) AS AVAILABLE_SEATS, C.* FROM SHOWTIME_TBL A JOIN SCREEN_TBL B ON A.SCREEN_NO = B.SCREEN_NO JOIN MOVIE_TBL C ON A.MOVIE_NO = C.MOVIE_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SHOWTIME_NO, TO_CHAR(RESERVATION_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD'), SUM(RESERVATION_VISITOR) AS TOTAL_RESERVED_VISITORS FROM RESERVATION_TBL GROUP BY SHOWTIME_NO, RESERVATION_DATE ) R ON A.SHOWTIME_NO = R.SHOWTIME_NO WHERE B.CINEMA_NO = #{cinemaNo} AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP BETWEEN A.SHOWTIME_START AND A.SHOWTIME_END ORDER BY A.MOVIE_NO ASC, A.SCREEN_NO, A.SHOWTIME_TIME

SELECT A.*, B.*, B.SCREEN_SEAT - NVL(R.TOTAL_RESERVED_VISITORS, 0) AS AVAILABLE_SEATS, C.* FROM SHOWTIME_TBL A JOIN SCREEN_TBL B ON A.SCREEN_NO = B.SCREEN_NO JOIN MOVIE_TBL C ON A.MOVIE_NO = C.MOVIE_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SHOWTIME_NO, TO_CHAR(RESERVATION_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD'), SUM(RESERVATION_VISITOR) AS TOTAL_RESERVED_VISITORS FROM RESERVATION_TBL WHERE RESERVATION_DATE=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP GROUP BY SHOWTIME_NO, RESERVATION_DATE ) R ON A.SHOWTIME_NO = R.SHOWTIME_NO WHERE B.CINEMA_NO = #{cinemaNo} AND A.SHOWTIME_TIME > TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'HH24:MI') ORDER BY A.MOVIE_NO ASC, A.SCREEN_NO, A.SHOWTIME_TIME

SELECT * FROM SHOWTIME_TBL A JOIN SCREEN_TBL B ON A.SCREEN_NO = B.SCREEN_NO JOIN MOVIE_TBL C on A.MOVIE_NO=C.MOVIE_NO WHERE B.CINEMA_NO = #{cinemaNo} ORDER BY A.MOVIE_NO ASC,A.SCREEN_NO, A.SHOWTIME_TIME

SELECT A.*, B.*, B.SCREEN_SEAT - NVL(R.TOTAL_RESERVED_VISITORS, 0) AS AVAILABLE_SEATS, C.* FROM SHOWTIME_TBL A JOIN SCREEN_TBL B ON A.SCREEN_NO = B.SCREEN_NO JOIN MOVIE_TBL C ON A.MOVIE_NO = C.MOVIE_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SHOWTIME_NO, TO_CHAR(RESERVATION_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD'), SUM(RESERVATION_VISITOR) AS TOTAL_RESERVED_VISITORS FROM RESERVATION_TBL WHERE RESERVATION_DATE=#{selectDate} GROUP BY SHOWTIME_NO, RESERVATION_DATE ) R ON A.SHOWTIME_NO = R.SHOWTIME_NO WHERE B.CINEMA_NO = #{cinemaNo} AND #{selectDate} BETWEEN A.SHOWTIME_START AND A.SHOWTIME_END ORDER BY A.MOVIE_NO ASC, A.SCREEN_NO, A.SHOWTIME_TIME
SELECT * FROM CINEMA_TBL ORDER BY CINEMA_NO ASC
